attributes.action: Have an immediate referendum to prevent all or any further COVID lock-downs.
attributes.background: Lock-downs across the UK have caused economic disaster for citizens and country alike.  Not to mention the scars on people's mental health and the deaths that will be caused due to diagnosed cancers.    The UK public deserve an opportunity by referendum to prevent this from EVER happening again.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
